page.title: 13Studley,Wiltshire.
page.content: Most of this area is farming with small villages and groups of cottages. Studley is a quiet little village with an old Wesleyan chapel.Some of the cottages are being extended,and look very well cared for. Nearby is a large Garden Centre, selling not only plants,but garden furniture,paving slabs for patios, and other items for garden maintenance. Families use it for outings. The only other concern in Studley is the saw mills. Each Winter,so the residents say, Studley is cut off by snow!
